attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could keep up to date with our 🧚‍♀️current president🧚‍♀️ but I was so disappointed when it wouldn’t stop spamming me with requests to access my location!! I hit no MULTIPLE TIMES and then it started spamming me to share the app with everyone 😤 once or twice would be fine but not every time I click on something!! The app felt messy and underdeveloped as well. If this app is so poorly managed, how can we expect Trump to put any care into more serious matters?? His efforts are clearly lacking. I also find it ridiculous that Trump, who has more than enough money to spare, is using this app to beg citizens for money for him to run again. Maybe instead of taking MORE of our money, he could be donating to charities or supporting women’s rights and access to birth control. Seeing that employers can now deny women’s coverage of birth control is disgusting!! What happened to keeping church and state separate?? Apparently Trump doesn’t care about that. I use birth control to regulate my hormones and bleeding as I was getting my period every 2 weeks and bleeding so much it caused me to faint. Birth control was the only way I could safely fix it, and now I might not be able to afford it!! If he can’t run an app properly, can’t keep church and state separate, is begging for money, AND won’t respect that I don’t want to share my location........ wow. This app doesn’t even deserve 1 star rating but I can’t rate it lower 😤 do yourself a favor and don’t download this app. It’s a WASTE OF STORAGE SPACE AND TIME!!! You’d be better off watching bubbles guppies with toddlers than spending time on this app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!! 😤🧚‍♀️
